arts.ttl: Leicester vs Blackburn - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Leicester City and Blackburn Rovers, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Leicester vs Blackburn predictions: Foxes to bounce back
arts.sum: Leicester have been finding wins hard to come by Elliott Bretland fancies the Foxes to take care of poor recent travellers Blackburn Rovers at the King Power Stadium.
